```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
coords <- read.csv('Karnataka_District_Coordinates.csv')
karnataka_map <- ggplot(data=coords)+
  geom_polygon(aes(x=long, y=lat, group=group), color= 'black', fill=NA)
karnataka_map
```

```{r}
coords <- read.csv('Karnataka_District_Coordinates.csv')
coords$Name <- as.character(coords$District) # changed district to name as a character

karnataka_map <- ggplot(data=coords)+
  geom_polygon(aes(x=long, y=lat, group=group, fill=Name), color='black')+
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE)
karnataka_map
```
